content:
Ukrainian scouts have published a intercepted conversation of civilians from Belgorod to restrict movement within the region, lack of food (in some areas) and the appeal of the head of Gravoron to the residents with a call to leave the city.

Intercepted conversationPublishedMain Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine.

In particular, in conversation, the Russians discuss what everyone is called for evacuation through shelling and lack of products:

  • “I’m telling you, Belgorod was closed the entrance, well, I probably understand that only who is registered, and nowhere, in short, in short - leave Belgorod”
  • “She wrote that there is no good morning, and sent a video where they bombed, everything burns ...”
  • "They said that food sets will be issued, because there is nowhere to take products, nothing works"

IUU also emphasized that for every military crime committed against Ukraine, there will be a fair retribution.

As reported by the Armyinform, RussiansModernization is carried outOnyx anti -ship missiles.
title: “Belgorod closed the entrance, there is nowhere to take products, nothing works” - the gur is crossed
description: The intercepted conversation was published by the Main Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. ...
author: Army Inform
